channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Humble Heroines: Action, Adventure, & Intrigue Encore
item.description: Games full of strength, hope & resilience
item.content:encoded: Journey alongside some of gaming’s most incredible heroines in this bundle packed with white-knuckle action, quirky wonder, grim resilience, and more! Discover the wonderfully weird world of Eastward, a charming indie action RPG brimming with heart and character. Slay to the beat in Metal: Hellsinger, a rhythm FPS bursting with action and tunes that are brutal in equal measures. Experience narrative gaming at its most heartrending in A Plague Tale: Innocence, set in some of the darkest hours of human history. Get all these games and more, and help support Girls Who Code and Girls Make Games with your purchase!

item.title: Future Games Show Discovery Encore
item.content:encoded: Relive the Future Games Show Summer Showcase—which was live on June 8th—with this bundle of games packed with hits that graced the show in years past! Brace yourself for Gloomwood, a haunting immersive sim set in a Victorian-inspired world teeming with secrets and dread. Become the star of a deadly retro future Truman Show-style reality show in the thrilling 2.5D adventure American Arcadia. Set sail on a cooperative roguelite romp across hazardous, monster-infested seas in Ship of Fools. Pay what you want for all these, plus 5 other great games, and help support It Gets Better and Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!

item.title: Wholesome Snack 2024
item.description: Cute, calm, and curated for you
item.content:encoded:
Looking to unwind with some cozy games? The Wholesome Snack Bundle celebrates the Wholesome Snack indie game showcase and offers a selection of titles brimming with charm. Step into the paws of an adventurous feline in Little Kitty, Big City. Immerse yourself in a world where farming meets magic in Fae Farm, and relax to the soothing vibes of Spirit City: Lofi Sessions. These games—and more—invite you to explore the softer, kinder side of gaming and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

Wholesome Snack: The Game Awards Edition returns December 10, 2024 starting at 12:00 PM Pacific, 3:00 PM Eastern. The digital showcase will be presented via YouTube and Twitch livestreams.

item.title: Rawcember to Remember
item.content:encoded: Ready to play something new? The world of indie gaming is vast, deep, and bursting with amazing titles. Publishers like Raw Fury release amazing indie games that span a variety of genres—from serious shooters to musical puzzle games. Get awesome indie titles like Dome Keeper Deluxe Edition, Kingdom Two Crowns: Norse Lands Edition, Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley, and more with Raw Fury’s RAWcember to Remember bundle! Experience new games and help support Save the Children with your purchase.
